verses.name: Ezekiel 48:33
verses.text: And at the south side four thousand and five hundred measures: and three gates; one gate of Simeon, one gate of Issachar, one gate of Zebulun.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:34
verses.text: At the west side four thousand and five hundred, with their three gates; one gate of Gad, one gate of Asher, one gate of Naphtali.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:35
verses.text: It was round about eighteen thousand measures: and the name of the city from that day shall be, The Lord is there.
